text: "Most CEOs I talk to say we're in a recession right now."
author: Blackrock CEO, Larry Fink

text: "The Fed will keep at it until the job is done."
author: Federal Reserve Chair, Jerome Powell

text: "Markets are trading as if we're going to have a soft landing. I'm not convinced."
author: JPMorgan CEO, Jamie Dimon

text: "The AI revolution is the most profound tech transformation in our lifetimes."
author: NVIDIA CEO, Jensen Huang

text: "Interest rates are the price of money. We're resetting the price of money from zero."
author: BlackRock CIO, Rick Rieder

text: "We're seeing a significant shift away from just-in-time to just-in-case supply chains."
author: Maersk CEO, Vincent Clerc

text: "In AI, we are in the first minute of the first day of the first inning."
author: Coinbase CEO, Brian Armstrong

text: "In AI, we are in the first minute of the first day of the first inning."
author: Microsoft CEO, Satya Nadella

text: "This is not just a cycle. What we are going through is a fundamental restructuring of the global economy."
author: Tesla CEO, Elon Musk

text: "Resilience in the face of uncertainty is what defines long-term investors."
author: Bridgewater Associates Co-CIO, Greg Jensen

text: "We’re witnessing a regime shift in inflation expectations across the globe."
author: IMF Chief Economist, Pierre-Olivier Gourinchas

text: "The economy doesn’t pivot on headlines—it pivots on data and sentiment."
author: Morgan Stanley Chief Economist, Seth Carpenter

text: "In every market correction lies the seed of the next rally."
author: ARK Invest CEO, Cathie Wood

text: "You can’t fight the Fed, but you can prepare for its consequences."
author: DoubleLine CEO, Jeffrey Gundlach

text: "Energy transition is not optional—it's inevitable."
author: BP CEO, Murray Auchincloss

text: "Data is the new oil, but AI is the refinery."
author: Salesforce CEO, Marc Benioff

text: "Rate cuts without disinflation are just wishful thinking."
author: Former Treasury Secretary, Larry Summers

text: "We're building the infrastructure of tomorrow's internet today."
author: Amazon CEO, Andy Jassy

text: "Economic cycles don't die of old age—they're murdered by policy mistakes."
author: Economist, Mohamed El-Erian

text: "The next financial crisis won't come from where we're looking."
author: Roubini Macro Associates CEO, Nouriel Roubini

text: "A digital currency revolution is already underway—central banks are just catching up."
author: ECB President, Christine Lagarde

text: "You can't automate trust, but you can scale it with blockchain."
author: Binance Founder, Changpeng Zhao

text: "Innovation thrives in volatility."
author: Stripe CEO, Patrick Collison

text: "The future of money is programmable."
author: Ethereum Co-founder, Vitalik Buterin

text: "If you're not investing in AI now, you're already behind."
author: Alphabet CEO, Sundar Pichai

text: "We're in a transition from capital-intensive to knowledge-intensive economies."
author: World Bank President, Ajay Banga

text: "Financial literacy is national security in the 21st century."
author: Fintech Entrepreneur, Sallie Krawcheck

text: "In investing, your temperament matters more than your intellect."
author: Legendary Investor, Warren Buffett

text: "A slowdown is not a setback—it's an opportunity to reposition."
author: Goldman Sachs CIO, Sharmin Mossavar-Rahmani

text: "Debt is a tool, not a solution."
author: Ray Dalio, Bridgewater Founder

text: "The economic engine is recalibrating, not stalling."
author: OECD Secretary-General, Mathias Cormann

text: "If you don't digitise, you'll disappear."
author: HSBC Group CEO, Noel Quinn

text: "The currency of leadership is credibility."
author: Starbucks CEO, Laxman Narasimhan

text: "We're entering the decade of decentralisation."
author: Andreessen Horowitz Partner, Chris Dixon

text: "Technology doesn’t just disrupt markets—it reshapes societies."
author: Alibaba Founder, Jack Ma

text: "Sustainability isn’t a cost—it’s an investment."
author: Unilever CEO, Hein Schumacher

text: "Revolutions don’t announce themselves—they’re built over time."
author: Tesla & SpaceX CEO, Elon Musk

text: "There's no such thing as a free market lunch."
author: Nobel Laureate Economist, Paul Krugman

text: "Banking is becoming a tech business, whether we like it or not."
author: JPMorgan CTO, Lori Beer

text: "A tech-enabled economy is a resilient economy."
author: Cisco CEO, Chuck Robbins

text: "AI won't replace humans, but humans using AI will replace those who don't."
author: PwC Global Chairman, Bob Moritz

text: "Every crisis reveals the fragility of what we assumed was strong."
author: Economist, Stephanie Kelton

text: "Capital chases clarity, not hype."
author: Sequoia Capital Partner, Roelof Botha

text: "Deflation is a bigger long-term threat than inflation."
author: ARK Invest Analyst, Brett Winton

text: "Geopolitics is the new market risk premium."
author: BlackRock Vice Chairman, Philipp Hildebrand

text: "The cost of inaction on climate change will eclipse any fiscal deficit."
author: Climate Economist, Nicholas Stern

text: "Markets hate uncertainty more than bad news."
author: Bloomberg Chief Economist, Tom Orlik

text: "Regulation lags innovation by a generation."
author: Ripple CEO, Brad Garlinghouse

text: "Productivity gains are the only real path to sustainable growth."
author: Fed Vice Chair, Philip Jefferson

text: "We're not just rebuilding infrastructure—we're redesigning it for the future."
author: US Secretary of Transportation, Pete Buttigieg

text: "A 21st-century economy demands 21st-century skills."
author: LinkedIn CEO, Ryan Roslansky

text: "Private capital is stepping in where public trust is fading."
author: KKR Co-CEO, Joseph Bae

text: "Monetary policy is no longer enough on its own."
author: BIS General Manager, Agustín Carstens

text: "The next unicorns will be climate-tech companies."
author: VC Investor, Chamath Palihapitiya

text: "Capital flows to where it feels safest, not always where it's needed most."
author: Nobel Laureate, Abhijit Banerjee

text: "Wealth creation in the 2020s will be powered by code."
author: GitHub CEO, Thomas Dohmke

text: "Digital identity is the cornerstone of a global economy."
author: Mastercard CEO, Michael Miebach

text: "Nothing compounds like trust."
author: Andreessen Horowitz GP, Angela Strange

text: "We're entering the era of precision economics."
author: MIT Economist, Daron Acemoglu
